rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with Vastu oriented entrance for positive energy.
Open-plan living area with integrated dining space and view to the exterior.
Integrated dining space within the open-plan living area.
Modern minimalist kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances and efficient storage.
Master bedroom designed with ample natural light and a view, adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom with privacy and functional space for daily activities.
Bedroom optimized for child or guest use, ensuring comfort and minimalistic design.
Bedroom for additional family member or office space.
En-suite bathroom in the master bedroom area with luxury fixtures and efficient layout.
Guest bathroom for family convenience, designed with minimalist features.
A private balcony area attached to the master bedroom for relaxation and Vastu alignment.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Garage entry connected directly to the street for convenient two-car access.

notes: The design incorporates Vastu principles by orienting key rooms towards the east or north directions where possible.
Open plan layout in living, dining, and kitchen areas ensures fluidity of space and natural light.
Minimalist aesthetic with clean lines and functional spaces to accommodate a family of four on a 30x40 ft plot.
